text: Luca Modric (; born 9 September 1985) is a Croatian football player who plays as a midfielder for Spanish club Real Madrid and is the captain of the Croatia national team. ==Club career statistics== He plays CM and CAM. |- |2002/03||Dinamo Zagreb||Prva HNL||0||0||||||||||||||0||0 |- |2003/04||Zrinjski Mostar||Premier League||22||8||||||||||||||22||8 |- |2004/05||Inter Zaprešić||Prva HNL||18||4||||||||||||||18||4 |- |2004/05||rowspan="4"|Dinamo Zagreb||rowspan="4"|Prva HNL||6||0||||||||||||||6||0 |- |2005/06||31||7||||||||||||||31||7 |- |2006/07||30||6||||||||||4||0||34||6 |- |2007/08||25||13||||||||||9||3||34||16 |- |2008/09||rowspan="2"|Tottenham Hotspur||rowspan="2"|Premier League||34||3||2||1||4||0||4||1||44||5 |- |2009/10|||||||||||||||||||| 110||30||||||||||13||3||123||33 22||8||||||||||||||22||8 34||3||2||1||4||0||4||1||44||5 166||41||2||1||4||0||17||4||189||46 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2006||12||2 |- |2007||10||1 |- |2008||11||3 |- |2009||3||1 |- |2010|||| |- !Total||36||7 |} ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Ballon d'Or winners Category:2006 FIFA World Cup players Category:Real Madrid players Category:FIFA World Player of the Year winners Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2024 players
